entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -34.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 11:15 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -34.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -37.8°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
